correct.text: The main page is OpenStreetMap.org; however, pages like osm.org or redirect to the main page.

questions.prompt: What is the web address of OpenStreetMap?

correct.text: OSM provides the following map styles in its main page: Standard, CyclOSM, Cyclism, Transport, OPNVKarte and Humanitarian.

questions.prompt: How many map styles OpenStreetMap provides?

answers: Provide a username, password and a valid email address
questions.prompt: What do you need to open an account in OpenStreetMap?

correct.text: OSM can be modified with different editors, some from the computer (JOSM), some from the mobile (Vespucci, StreetComplete), some from browsers (iD, Potlatch, Level0). And there others for different purposes.

questions.prompt: What are the editors to modify OSM?

correct.text: You can check the different elements in these pages: OSM Wiki Elements.

questions.prompt: What are the different kind of elements can be drawn on the map?

title: Do you know the basics of OpenStreetMap.
